Class Recursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Recursion

  • public class Recursion
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to use recursion to calculate possibility for a team to win the game.
    Author:
    zhaoru

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Recursion() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method to calculate time difference by recursion
      double p(int i, int j)
      method to calculate possibility to win with i and j by recursion Pre-condition: i and j are within the index of the table Post-condition: the value of certain cell is returned, if i or j is negative or equals to 0 at the same time, return -1 BigTheta: 2^n

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Recursion

        public Recursion()

    • Method Detail

      • p

        public double p(int i,
                int j)
        method to calculate possibility to win with i and j by recursion Pre-condition: i and j are within the index of the table Post-condition: the value of certain cell is returned, if i or j is negative or equals to 0 at the same time, return -1 BigTheta: 2^n
        Parameters:
        i - A needs i games to win
        j - B needs j games to win
        Returns:
        probability that if A needs i games to win and B needs j games to win that A will eventually win the series

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method to calculate time difference by recursion
        Parameters:
        args - arguments
